Highlights.name: Empowering Employees and Automating Payroll Processes
Highlights.description: Hier Payroll seems to automate payroll processes, which can save time and effort for both employers and employees. The article also mentions that it empowers employees, possibly by giving them self-service access to their payroll information.

enhanced_description: Hier Business Solutions, Inc. offers an advanced, web-based, and cloud-based HRIS, Timekeeping, and Payroll system, primarily targeting the Philippine market. Positioned as highly configurable and easy to use, the 'Hier Payroll' system is well-suited for remote workforces. It automates payroll processes, supports biometric integration, and includes features such as retroactive pay computation and unlimited processing of regular and special payrolls. The company aims to modernize HR operations, simplify daily time records, and seamlessly automate payroll to improve employee happiness and engagement.
